revision.text: POssibly: A treatise on Putrid Intestinal Remitting Fevers, in which the laws of the febrile state and sol-lunar influence being investigated and defined, are applied to explain the nature of the various forms, crises, and other phenomena of these fevers; and thence is deduced and instituted An improved Method of curing them. By Francis Balfour, M.D. S.R.M.E.S.H. (Edinburgh : Printed by William Smellie, MDCCXC. [1790]). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2505719~S1
